trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_TRANSFORMHLW2018_000_000<tab>A minion of the Continental Circus? Me? Never! I am but a fun-loving imp, here to help my fellow revelers enjoy the Wake. Ehehehe... In fact, I can offer you a <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> convincing guise for the masquerade. And it won't cost a single gil!

TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_TRANSFORMHLW2018_100_001<tab>All I need is your memory of someone, someone who made a <var 1A 02 /var>strong<var 1A 01 /var> impression. Someone unforgettable, someone <var 1A 02 /var>powerful<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, that's it...
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_TRANSFORMHLW2018_000_001<tab>All I need is for you to recall a journey, a journey unforgettable. Traverse your memories, and tell me what you see...
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A1_000_001<tab>A journey to forge this realm anew.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A1_000_002<tab>A journey to end a conflict of one thousand years.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A1_000_003<tab>A journey to liberate lands near and far.

TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_TRANSFORMHLW2018_000_003<tab>Good, good. Now think of someone remarkable you encountered in that time, someone <var 1A 02 /var>powerful<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, that's it...
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_001<tab>A charming and compassionate Lalafellin lady of noble birth.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_002<tab>A Padjali woman as gentle yet indomitable as nature itself.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_003<tab>A stalwart Roegadyn woman of unshakable conviction.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_004<tab>A rugged Hyuran man unmatched in loyalty and valor.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_005<tab>A blue-eyed Elezen man with a heart noble and true.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_006<tab>A robed Lalafellin woman of the intellectual persuasion.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_007<tab>A dauntless Hyuran man of integrity from the Far East.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_008<tab>A devoted Auri woman who has mastered the art of the shinobi.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_009<tab>An Auri woman strong of body and stronger of will.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_010<tab>A haughty but valorous Auri man with a yearning heart.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_011<tab>A sweet Auri woman who lives according to her faith.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_012<tab>A crimson-garbed Hyuran woman fleet of foot and fist.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_A2_000_013<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_TRANSFORMHLW2018_000_010<tab>Ehehehe... That will do nicely. Don't worry, this won't hurt much at all! Just close your eyes...
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>Use the special action Unveil to remove the effects of transfiguration and return to your usual form.
TEXT_FESANV2018TRANSFORM_00535_TRANSFORMHLW2018_000_020<tab>Pay no mind to the little imp in the corner. Ehehehe...
